relevant_findings.general: Obese female, comfortable appearing, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Mucous membranes moist, no scleral icterus, pupils equal, round, reactive to light and accommodation.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 and S2, systolic ejection murmur present.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Limited by habitus, clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Tenderness to palpation in the epigastric area, soft, bowel sounds present, no hepatosplenomegaly appreciated, no rebound or guarding.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented x3, impaired attention, cannot spell 'world' backwards.
relevant_findings.extremities: Trace edema to bilateral extremities, dorsalis pedis pulses intact bilaterally.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient has no complaints on the floor, reports no consistent abdominal pain or diarrhea since ED visit.
